Name: Fairy Cream
Ingredients: 22.5 ml De Kuyper Brown Crème de Cacao
15 ml Dutch Cacao white crème de cacao
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Garnish with dusting of nutmeg grated over cocktail.
Review: Absinthe sits majestically with cream and chocolate in this indulgent after-dinner cocktail.
History: Created in 2010 by bartending legend Dick Bradsell in London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Fairy Cream contains 330 calories
